card.name: KH Hades Cup
card.text: When Hades Cup is defeated defending player becomes the Loser. Whenever one or more creatures attack Hades Cup, defending player may pay 2 life to create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token tapped and blocking. Destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: KH Olympus Cup
card.text: While you control Olympus Cup you are the Monarch. Whenever one or more creatures attack Olympus Cup you may create a 0/1 colorless artifact creature token named “Barrel” tapped and blocking. Destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: KH One sky on destiny
card.text: Scry 2, then you and target opponent draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: KH Strike Raid
card.text: Target creature gains range until end of turn. (When this creature attacks it takes no damage from creatures without range or reach.)

card.name: KH Ars Arcanum
card.text: Target creature gains menace until end of turn. (That creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: KH Ragnarok
card.text: Target creature gains splash damage 1 until end of turn. (When this creature deals damage to a creature, deal 1 damage to other creatures that player controls.)

card.name: KH Sonic Blade
card.text: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. (That creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.)

card.name: KH Attack the Barrel
card.text: Destroy target artifact, then tap target creature.

card.name: KH Red Trinity
card.text: Chose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Deal 2 damage to target creature token.

card.name: KH Undying Wickedness
card.text: Target black creature from your graveyard, put it on the battlefield. That creature gains haste. (That creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: KH Restoring Sleep
card.text: Target creature you control loses all its abilities, then it gains all abilities of target creature you control.

card.name: KH Travel to New Worlds
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: KH Voluntary Sacrifice
card.text: Sacrifice X creatures without boss, create Shadow tokens for each creature sacrificed this way.

card.name: KH Strike Raid (copy)
card.text: Target creature gains range until end of turn. (When this creature attacks it takes no damage from creatures without range or reach.)

card.name: KH Ars Arcanum (copy)
card.text: Target creature gains menace until end of turn. (That creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: KH Ragnarok (copy)
card.text: Target creature gains splash damage 1 until end of turn. (When this creature deals damage to a creature, deal 1 damage to other creatures that player controls.)

card.name: KH Sonic Blade (copy)
card.text: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. (That creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.)
